title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 92.2 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 92.2 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The forms of waiver provided in section
91.7
(a)(5)(ii)
of
this Title may be used in lieu of the above form provided such form of waiver
is printed on the reverse of a uniform traffic ticket issued to the defendant
for the violation for which a plea of guilty by mail is being
made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
92.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
